contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Bernisse |image_flag = Flag of Bernisse.svg |flag_size = 120x100px |image_shield =Coat_of_arms_of_Bernisse.svg |shield_size = 120x100px |image_map = LocatieBernisse.png |mapsize = 250px |image_skyline=Kerkinoudenhoorn.JPG |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[South Holland]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 68.59 |area_land_km2 = 57.34 |area_water_km2 = 11.24 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 12665 |population_density_km2 = 221 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd = 51.83 |latNS = N |longd = 4.23 |longEW = E |website = [http://www.gemeentebernisse.nl www.gemeentebernisse.nl] }} '''Bernisse''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Bernisse.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] in the western [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[South Holland]]. The municipality had a population of 12,665 in 2007, and covers an area of {{convert|68.59|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} of which {{convert|11.25|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} is water. The municipality is named after the [[Bernisse (river)|Bernisse]] River, which flows right through it from the [[Spui (river)]] to the [[Brielse meer]] and separates the [[estuary]] [[island]]s of [[Voorne-Putten|Voorne and Putten]]. The municipality of Bernisse consists of the following communities: [[Abbenbroek]], [[Biert, Bernisse|Biert]], [[Geervliet]], [[Heenvliet]], [[Oudenhoorn]], [[Simonshaven]], [[Zuidland]]. The municipality of Bernisse was formed on January 1, 1980, through the amalgamation of the municipalities Abbenbroek, Oudenhoorn, Zuidland, and parts of the municipalities Geervliet (including Simonshaven) and Heenvliet.
